newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Converse estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Converse estimates cut.

text.p: -- Smith Barney cut its third-quarter estimate for Converse Inc to a loss of $0.18/shr from a profit of $0.12, and cut the fourth-quarter estimate to a loss of $0.23/shr from a profit of $0.03, a market source said
-- Smith Barney cut the 1996 estimate to a loss of $0.82/shr from a loss of $0.27/shr and cut the 1997 estimate to a loss of $0.07/shr from a profit of $0.25, the source said
-- Converse off 1/8 to 6-3/8 in early trading
